channel.title: Seight Custom Cycling Wear: New Products - Tri & Run
channel.description: A list of the new products at Seight Custom Cycling Wear.

item.title: Seight Custom Run Top
item.description:
Soft, excellent performance, snug fit and comfy to wear are the features of our Seight Run Top. It is manufactured using superb quality fabrics, and specially engineered to yield optimal flexibility and movement. It is light in weight and possesses a..

Price: $59.09

item.title: Seight Custom Run Singlet
item.description:
Our Seight Run Singlet is meticulously designed, inexpensive,UV protective, sweat-expelling, snug, soft and cosy. It is made of soft compressed moisture wicking polyester fabrics, which is anti-bacterial and odour-free. It’s air wicking feature..

Price: $59.09

item.title: Seight Custom Tri Suit
item.description:
The Seight Tri Suit is hard to beat. Made with input from pro triathletes, it an indispensable part of the racers gear drawer. It is made of supremely lightweight lycra, with multi direction stretch for support and total compression. This tri suit ha..

Price: $168.18
